remarks:
Alternate definition of "at most one."  Definition of [BellMachover] p. 460, except that definition has the side condition that ` y ` not occur in ` ph ` in place of our hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 18-Aug-2019.)

statement:
